objects.specification: A flat exhibition floor panel forming the base of the booth, with a smooth surface and subtle matte finish to ensure an even walking surface. The flooring material is a neutral light grey tone for a modern exhibition feel.
A vertical panel wall enclosing the booth, with a smooth surface and sound-dampening material, painted in a clean matte white finish to provide a neutral backdrop for exhibits.
A vertical panel wall enclosing the booth, with a smooth surface and sound-dampening material, painted in a clean matte white finish to provide a neutral backdrop for exhibits.
A vertical panel wall enclosing the booth, with a smooth surface and sound-dampening material, painted in a clean matte white finish to provide a neutral backdrop for exhibits.
A vertical panel wall enclosing the booth, with a smooth surface and sound-dampening material, painted in a clean matte white finish to provide a neutral backdrop for exhibits.

A sleek modern demo car model with aerodynamic curves, high-gloss paint finish, tinted windows, detailed headlights and wheels, showcasing a brand logo on the hood. Scaled to realistic full-size car proportions relative to the booth.

A modern reception desk with a smooth countertop surface, built-in paneling, subtle branding elements, metallic accents and sturdy leg supports, sized for comfortable visitor interaction and paperwork display.
A tall rectangular display stand with a stable base and flat top surface for holding informational materials or digital screens, featuring a minimalistic frame design in a matte dark grey finish.
A tall rectangular display stand with a stable base and flat top surface for holding informational materials or digital screens, featuring a minimalistic frame design in a matte dark grey finish.
A compact visitor chair with cushioned seat and back rest, supportive legs and stabilizing crossbars, upholstered in a neutral fabric tone, sized for comfortable seating.

A rectangular decorative hanging banner with vibrant car-themed graphics, printed on lightweight fabric or vinyl, with small attachment points to a ceiling rig, aligned horizontally and unobtrusive to exhibit visibility.

An overhead directional spotlight fixture with cylindrical housing and focused beam lens, mounted on a ceiling rig with an adjustable swivel joint, emitting bright white light to prominently illuminate the demo car.

A small potted decorative plant with lush green foliage, planted in a simple cylindrical pot, adding a natural aesthetic accent to a corner of the booth.
